name: JusticeAdvisor
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: My Lady Justice Code Talk gives examples and advice on how to promote the 12 Codes of Justice on a personal, social, and global level. The 12 Codes are: faith, love, compassion, integrity, awareness, passion, creativity, ambition, wisdom, empowerment, prosperity, and serenity. We compile short, meaningful answers to questions like: how can I become a better public speaker? Code Talk researches some of the best tips, methods and pointers, and compiles them into short audio clips of the best advice across the industry.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
